channel.title: Battlefield 2 refuses to work on my computer
channel.description:
Battlefield 2 (Steam version) tells me that I have an invalid CD key when I try to join a multiplayer server. I know it's valid, it's the one STEAM gave me. Does anyone know how to fix this? Google turned up absolutely nothing.
(EDITED)

item.title: Battlefield 2 refuses to work on my computer
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
I’m having the same problem. Let me know if they give you a solution.
Steam Support is some of the worst customer service ever spawned. I got my account hacked, and it took the 9 days to respond – goddamn fuckers.

item.source: Battlefield 2 refuses to work on my computer

item.title: Battlefield 2 refuses to work on my computer
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
Sarcastic Schmaaa:

I bought BF2 yesterday since it was on sale, but it won’t play. When I join a server, it says my CD key is invalid, and when I try singleplayer, it crashes to desktop without an error message. Does anyone know how to get this game to work?

I know my PC can run it, even though it’s shit.

I’m downloading now. I bought it cause it was on sale aswell. I’ll let you know what the outcome is and get back to you.

Read full topic
